post.body: Hi, ZeroMe!

# Site of Interesting is launched, in beta:
[Access it.](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BVGUB9cyZjUJJbRtQZmgS4YpZE1v8Nn1R/)

Site of Interesting on Git Center:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JJcjUzSaGRjb668sJPZnYkKphKbBptKPr

Help the information, seed Kiwipedia's english hub:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/17FjMvAGAWAHxUohzk5HEq5EgjoCXnXV19/

# ZeroNet's developers

Someone is looking to create a new project here?
[Here is a list with needed zites/services/plugins](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BVGUB9cyZjUJJbRtQZmgS4YpZE1v8Nn1R/needed.html).

# Needed sites on ZeroNet
If you're a developer, please develop a site/app/service/plugin/program that ZeroNet needs.

* Newsletters (GrowSurf-like)
* Comments (Disqus-like)
* Social gadgets (Profile/Like/Share-button, for ZeroMe/Peeper)
* Books (Wattpad-like, can be based on Zerobook with social features like ZeroMedium haves)
* Podcasting and Music platform dedicated to original content (suggestion by @krixano: here)
* Good and Up to date News zites that aren't just mirrors of clearnet stuff (suggestion by @krixano: here)
* Goodreads and Review zites (suggestion by @krixano: here)
* Cryptocurrency assisted by Git (using commits as blocks in blockchain)
* Plugin that helps every peer help to crawl URLs for search engines
* Plugin for multiple site owners (using BTCADDRESS+BTCADDRESS or hash in the URL)
* eBazar bridge with plugin
* Zite listing actors, movies, series, TV shows, youtubers (IMDB-like)
* Music Lyrics/Cifras
* News aggregator (Google Newsstand-like)
* Translator, using open-source translator codes, converting C code using Emscripten, every language used as merger sites
* ZeroMaps
* Feedback service, can be integrated with zites (Uservoice-like)
* .exe downloads zite
* .apk downloads zite
* Game ROMs downloads zite
* Pokemon fansite
* Calendar zite (integrated with ZeroMe's events)
* Contacts zite (integrated with ZeroMe)
* Zite to draw and post art/design images (Deviantart-like)
* Zite to create musics (Beatlab-like)

Original and updated list available [here](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BVGUB9cyZjUJJbRtQZmgS4YpZE1v8Nn1R/needed.html).

My blog:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Hj1HwHrTyB7WkvBN5x822m1iGV2kaXiAv/

Portuguese hub for Kiwipedia:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Bo7gi7gnf6qZpPgDCEUuN5hQfLueMkPJF/

# Is USV video format doable?

I'm creating a video format that contains text data and .png frames inside a compressed .7z file.
Site: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HDMywbRZkin9HhmheaDFHCzaZhCfLhZLH/
According to the words in the [site](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HDMywbRZkin9HhmheaDFHCzaZhCfLhZLH/):
"Do you imagine if we have the power of YouTube's videos in a file on our devices? A USV file can have credits to the authors, multiple language subtitles/audios, indicative rating, tags, etc. All it embedded into a single video file!"

But to read a single data, would not be necessary to decompress all files?
Would not be better to simply use links as metadata in WEBM files?

Thanks in advance for your concerns and suggestions.

[Original post in ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1533701473_15hL2gR4oCSgKBbndn3MxY8Hc5xoy1vqCe/Is+USV+video+format+doable).

# ZeroNet+ app

Hi!
I'm developing an app to give more features to ZeroNet.
This app is developed using the Construct 2 game engine.

Do you want to easily enable/disable your plugins and install new ones?

Custom download folders, decentralized updates, better ZeroHello page, new domain extensions and live streamming are missing features?

ZeroNet+ and its plugin are developed to achieve those and other features.

Comment and share your througts,
Zite and app is to be released soon, so follow the [original topic on ZeroTalk](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1534205182_15hL2gR4oCSgKBbndn3MxY8Hc5xoy1vqCe/ZeroNet+Plus+discussion+topic).

Alternatives to ZeroHello page?
What are the new features?
Who is the owner of Zirch Automated Search?

# If you are a developer:

Can you create a zite (with ZeroID) where users can list their plugins in profile? Only it.
The rest will be done in integration with ZeroNet+'s plugin I'm developing.

* [My post about ZeroNet Plus](http://127.0.0.1:43110/peeper.bit/?Post/1SunAWK2VUT9GQK32MpwRfFPVgcBSJN9a/15hL2gR4oCSgKBbndn3MxY8Hc5xoy1vqCe/1534220903).

Reading "The truth of ZeroNet", very well written by Imachug, where everyone can understand how ZeroNet works.
This zip file is already on ZeroUp/IFS?
We don't were on the first times of Internet, but we are on the begin of the New Internet.

In my notebook, in Windows 10 can't change the brightness and the design makes sleepy. Also is slower and with privacy issues.
For your productivity and vision, prefer Windows 7.
For everything, learn and use Linux.

You can login with ZeroID in [Peeper](http://127.0.0.1:43110/peeper.bit/), but only can register with CryptoID: I need to fix it.
KaffieID and CryptoID aren't ready (they doesn't support unique names), so while proof-of-work ID provider isn't launched, we need to support ZeroID.

# How do I envision ZeroNet to be ready for mass of users

ZeroNet is a great project for who have fear about deep web or see difficulties in joining the free side of the Internet.
In deep web, russian government can take down a server of a LGBTQ+ community, while in ZeroNet it doesn't work at this manner.

ZeroNet's sites (in a cute form, called zites) are not in a server, but served by the visitors.
In a social network (such as [Peeper](http://127.0.0.1:43110/peeper.bit/)) you don't need to wait 5 minutes to load a simple post editor: the whole site is already on your machine, like a app.

Read more in my post on [ZeroMedium](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zeromedium.bit/?/15hL2gR4oCSgKBbndn3MxY8Hc5xoy1vqCe/how-do-i-envision-zeronet-to-be-ready-for-mass-of-users).

Step five:
Found KeePassX folder in my Linux backup, there should be other KeePassX folder.

Step 6:
Discovered that my Mega backups are recent, near to the date I was developing Peeper

Step 7:
Found that I also have Electrum data and privatekeys, I saved some of my zite's privatekeys on those.
Step 8: downloaded the first KeePassX folder (from Linux)

Step 9:
Tried to open this KeePassX folder, but it said the password is wrong.
Maybe I have a too up-do-date password.

Step 10:
Downloaded the another KeePassX folder, put the password with fear, but it worked.

Step 11:
It is a outdated password bnk, then I'll use Electrum.

Step 12:
Imported electrum-private-keys.json on Electrum, but it show a error.

Step 13:
Openned the downloaded Electrum, that have a data folder.

Step 14:
Older zites private keys found on Electrum.

Step 15:
Reached the data limit on hub before I say that this search have the good side: I didn't found Peeper's privatekey, but I recovered my Electrum with transactions and old KeePassX database with important passwords.
I'll search the whole SSD with a recovery software, to find Peeper's privatekey, but if I can't find, I'll create a new zite/address.
And after this limit, I'll move to ChameleonHub.

I logged on BitcoinTalk with my old account (thanks to the old KeePassX database) and I'm posting domains for auction.
I'll organize all my password bases into one, and backup it.
